items.title: Pan Asian Insurer
items.description: Planned and conducted a rapid 4-week CDP use case discovery and prioritisation to evaluate a Datalake versus a packaged solution approach.

items.title: French Health and Life Insurer
items.description: Led the design and delivery of an Adobe and Salesforce solution in a 24-week period to transform a Corporate Website to a digital sales channel, resulting in an increase in sold policies from less than 1% to 4% through real-time lead assignment and an enhanced “learn and buy” journey.

items.title: Multinational Bank in Singapore and Hong Kong
items.description: Conducted a 12-week discovery and design phase for Standard Chartered Bank aligning over 30 stakeholders on technology and business initiatives. Technologies from Adobe, Salesforce, Pega, and Appsflyer were evaluated.

items.title: A Canadian Life Insurer
items.description: Planned and led the technical delivery of an 11-week Marketo Engage Marketing CRM platform enablement project and successfully ran a pilot campaign.
